Included SUIT CSS utilities

The BBC Internal Bootstrap has a few of the most useful SUIT CSS utilities included by default.

  • suit-utils-display
  • suit-utils-layout
  • suit-utils-state
  • suit-utils-text
  • suit-utils-space - A forked version that adds classes for zeroing margin and padding

Custom utilities

As well as the above, there are a few custom utilities available

Text

  • u-textUpper - Uppercase
  • u-textLower - Lowercase
  • u-textCapitalize - Capitalize
